name: url
description: Direct url for the model (provider level url if none exists)

name: release_date
description: The month and year the model was released (day is set to a default of 1)

name: size
description: The number of parameters the model has

name: display_name
description: The alias for the model used on the website

name: is_reasoning
description: Whether the model is considered a reasoning model

name: is_vision
description: Whether the model is considered a vision model

name: created
description: The date this model was created for use (internally as a benchmark option), MM/YYYY (any DD value is a default as this information is not provided in the models.csv file)
